title: More efficient logic is needed for processing disk sorting when there is a border value for row value
OB: The current logic for processing disk sorting is not efficient when there is a border value for the row value. It takes a long time to sort the data on disk.
EB: More efficient logic is expected to process disk sorting when there is a border value for the row value. The data should be sorted directly in memory and then written to the file.
SR:
1. Copy the file to the destination folder.
2. Implement more efficient logic to sort the data directly in memory. 
3. Write the sorted data to the file.
